This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=mimas-zetoc.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-24T11:48:24Z Lorna Fairie 2015-02-24T11:47:17+00:00 2015-02-24T11:47:17+00:00 2014 Zetoc Survey Summary Available https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;a3652291.1502 2014 Zetoc Survey Summary Available. Lorna Fairie 2015-01-07T12:03:17+00:00 2015-01-07T12:03:17+00:00 Zetoc User Satisfaction Survey https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;899f449.1501 ** Apologies for cross-posting**<br><br>Happy New Year from the Zetoc Team.<br><br>Thank you to everyone who has taken the opportunity to fill in our online feedback survey so far - it is very much appreciated.<br><br>Just a reminder that the survey will close on 14th January, so there is still time to let us know your feedback on the service. [...] Lorna Fairie 2014-12-08T09:52:27+00:00 2014-12-08T09:52:27+00:00 Zetoc User Satisfaction Survey 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;75a72f33.1412 ** Apologies for cross-posting**<br><br>Please be advised that we are presently conducting an online survey for the Mimas Zetoc Service. The survey is presented when you first visit the service home page at: http://zetoc.mimas.ac.uk and also available by using the 'Zetoc Survey 2014' link listed in the 'Please Note' section.<br><br>It would be really appreciated if you are able to take a few minutes of your time to provide feedback on the service we provide at Mimas. The information gathered by the survey is used both to evaluate the service provided and to make continual improvement to best match what [...] Lorna Fairie 2014-12-01T13:30:19+00:00 2014-12-01T13:30:19+00:00 Zetoc Maintenance \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Tuesday 2 December, 9.00am - 10.00 am. Service at risk until 12.00 noon. https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;185ee568.1412 Following previous notification, please find a reminder of the scheduled maintenance on 02 December.<br><br>Zetoc Maintenance \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Tuesday 2 December, 9.00am - 10.00 am. Service at risk until 12.00 noon. Lorna Fairie 2014-11-13T10:47:15+00:00 2014-11-13T10:47:15+00:00 Zetoc no longer considered at risk https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;43ed5b4c.1411 Please be advised that following yesterday's message, the Zetoc service is no longer considered 'at risk' and should be working as normal.<br>If you do experience any issues please contact the Zetoc helpdesk zetoc@mimas.ac.uk<mailto:Zetoc@mimas.ac.uk><br><br>Thank you,<br><br>Kind regards,<br><br>Lorna Lorna Fairie 2014-11-12T12:13:05+00:00 2014-11-12T12:13:05+00:00 Zetoc service at risk 12/11/2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;78550542.1411 Please be advised that as of 12.00pm 12/11/2014, the Zetoc service should be considered as 'at risk' for the next 24 hours due to system errors.<br><br>We will issue more updates as soon as possible and apologies for any inconvenience.<br><br>Kind regards,<br>Lorna<br>~~~~~<br>Mimas Zetoc Support<br>e: zetoc@mimas.ac.uk<mailto:zetoc@mimas.ac.uk><br>w: http://zetoc.mimas.ac.uk<br>Twitter: @ZetocTeam Suzanne Williams 2014-05-13T08:26:19+00:00 2014-05-13T08:26:19+00:00 Completed: Zetoc Service Maintenance. https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=mimas-zetoc;3977e3fc.1405 Completed: Zetoc Service Maintenance.
